game.beginning: The world is plagued by a mysterious energy anomaly known as "The Devouring," which threatens to destroy all life on Earth.
game.ending: The player emerges victorious, having discovered the source of The Devouring and found a way to harness its power to heal the planet rather than destroy it.
game.synopsis:
Players take on the role of an archaeologist who discovers that The Devouring is not a natural phenomenon, but rather the result of an ancient civilization's attempts to harness technology from another dimension. As they dig deeper into the mystery, they must navigate treacherous landscapes, avoid deadly creatures born from the anomaly, and uncover the secrets of the ancient world.
Along the way, the player discovers that they have a personal connection to the events leading up to The Devouring, and must come to terms with their own destiny as they fight to save humanity.
game.title: Echoes of Eridu
